title: Knife, ca. 1675–1700
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Sabre-shaped blade, notched on upper edge, rounded end (later). Pistol-shaped ivory handle with beaded cresting upper edge, faceted panel opposite, gilded bolster.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1675–1700.
ca. 1675–1700. steel, ivory. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-150.
